mapper.sql: ID, LOGIN_ID, PASSWORD, NAME, Sex, CELLPHONE, REGISTER_TIME, EMAIL, STATUS, LAST_LOGIN_TIME, REGION_ID,HEAD_IMG
mapper.update: update e_user set HEAD_IMG = #{headImg} where ID = #{id}

update e_user
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGIN_ID = #{record.loginId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Sex = #{record.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CELLPHONE = #{record.cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTER_TIME = #{record.registerTime,jdbcType=DATE},
EMAIL = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LAST_LOGIN_TIME = #{record.lastLoginTime,jdbcType=DATE},
REGION_ID = #{record.regionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HEAD_IMG = #{record.headImg,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY},
where CELLPHONE = #{cellphone}

where name like concat('%',#{name},'%')

distinct
,

order by ${orderByClause}
